storyInfo: Wallach is infuriated at Texas's decision. Lavinia proposes a meeting with Bernardo, intending to question him about his decision.

attributes.content: Though I considered the possibility that Leontuzzo was trying to pull a fast one on me behind my back, my suspicions were confirmed the moment I saw you.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You're the real deal, a flesh-and-blood Texas.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Allow me to introduce myself. I am Wallach of Famiglia Rossati.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You're Columbian?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course. Most associates of Famiglia Rossati are.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: So, how did you enjoy prison life here?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: There was nothing special about it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Strange. Logically, you never should've spent so long in jail in the first place. Just what was Bellone thinking?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Is there something unusual about obeying the law?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The law? What do the courts here in Siracusa have to do with the so-called law?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Look at it this way. In most Siracusan cities, standing trial and going to jail is a common coming-of-age ritual for a young mafioso.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: After that, his famiglia associates go pick him up, like a warrior returning home triumphant.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Everything on the surface here is meaningless to those who live by the underworld's ways.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: What's your point?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You grew up in Columbia. Do I need to spell it out for you?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: 'A complete joke.' There's no other way to say it.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But that's why we were able to establish ourselves here so easily.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Do you enjoy talking politics?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You obviously don't.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: To be honest with you, I'm not a fan either.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I'll get to the point then. Why aren't you dead.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: None of your business.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Fine. Let me ask you a different question then. Why did you come back?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Didn't Leontuzzo tell you already? I owe the Bellones a favor.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So, let me get this straight. You knew the Bellones wanted to bring you back to deal with us Rossatis, but you still went along with it.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I didn't know that until I got here, but... you could say that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Your bluntness makes me wonder if there's something wrong with me, last of the Texases.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Are you going to tell me you forgot the Texas name used to rule all of Columbia's famiglie, large and small?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: That your grandfather, Salvadore, was the lodestar for every associate of every famiglia in Columbia?!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: What the Texases left behind... has nothing to do with me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Nothing to do with you?!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Wallach smashes his fist into the coffee table next to him, and fresh blood begins to seep from his fingers.
He does not seem to realize it.
You are Cellinia Texas! The granddaughter of Salvadore!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: As long as you live, those things have everything to do with you!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: The mere mention of your name at a Rossati table forces us to change the way we do things!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Texas was our pride!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Do you know how much effort Giovanna put in to reunite the remaining Columbian famiglie so that Salvadore's blood and sweat would not go to waste?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Do you have any idea what it was like to finally give in to Signora Sicilia, traveling thousands of miles to go from Columbia to Siracusa?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: In order to survive, we even gave up the technology to build a nomadic city, basically letting Siracusa construct a new one for freeâ€”
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: That was all because of the fall of Texas. It left us no choice but to accept this reality.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: And now you, the last Texas, deign to set foot here like you own the damned place.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Claiming that you have nothing to do with all this, that you're just here to pay off a debt.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You even go so far as to stand against us!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You owe the Bellones?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: That you're even alive means you owe a much bigger debt to the Columbian famiglie!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I might owe Giovanna an explanation, but I don't owe a thing to the Columbians.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: After I settle my accounts with the Bellones, I'm leaving Siracusa.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You think we'll take your word for it?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Your very existence shakes the foundations of Famiglia Rossati.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Where's Giovanna?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I'm asking, why are you here? Instead of Giovanna?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I speak for her.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: She wouldn't, for example, grovel at Signora Sicilia's feet.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Same as she wouldn't send a representative to meet me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You think you know her so well?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Judging from your expression, looks like I'm right.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hah... Isn't that unlucky.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Turns out I'm the one who doesn't know enough about the legendary Texas.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I always thought I was a pretty good actor.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You're not bad.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But, you speak eloquently and at great lengths about Siracusa, as if you've seen through the country for what it is. It feels... very familiar to me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I wouldn't keep doing that, if I were you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Because it proves... you don't understand this place well enough.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But, you are right about one thing. Now that I'm back, I should go have a chat with Giovanna.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You won't be seeing her.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Sorry about this, last of the Texases.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You're too much like a Siracusan. No, you are a Siracusan, through and through.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: So I cannot let you see the Donna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You'll shake her. And you'll shake others too. You'll bring ruin to a great many things.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: So, please turn back.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Go close the deal you have with the Bellones, and then crawl back wherever you came from.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You're free to do what you want from here.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But, I'll ask you to bear one thing in mind.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Famiglia Rossati does not welcome you.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Texas stands up and walks to the door.
Unconsciously, the would-be assassins part and make way for her.
She looks around, reading anger, bewilderment, disgust, confusion, and other emotions in the eyes of the Columbians.
That is what her surname brings to the table.
Texas.
She lets out a sigh and exits the room.
What an unexpected guest.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I want to see Bernardo.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've already warned you several times before not to call the Don by his first name, Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You know where he is, don't you?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Give me one reason why I should tell you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If standing here listening to you mock me from your position as the big winner is enough to get you to tell me, I'll gladly play along.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The big winner, huh...?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Whatever.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: It's not like you knowing will do any harm. The Don already left for the Saluzzo mansion.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You won't be able to see him.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If you want to stir up trouble in his household, that's on you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But if the Don has decided to open discussions with the Saluzzos, I suggest you don't stick your head where it doesn't belong.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Don't need to tell me twice.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: One more thing, Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I don't care what you think about me.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But, I hope you do remember this.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Leon is a made man in this famiglia, and he was the first to deviate from our path.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We are all one famiglia, and a famiglia ought to stick together.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Your path?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's a nice euphemism for craven ambition.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: A droplet of rain strikes the ridge of her eye socket and rolls down like a teardrop.
Never in her life has Lavinia experienced rain so frigid and biting in Siracusa.
But she promptly wipes away the streaks.
It's too soon for that.
Who is it?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm looking for Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: That's me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you have time right now?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I have a moment.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What services does your business offer?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We deliver letters, messages, goods, and... people.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Rain or shine.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Perfect. I have a job for you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh, Sora, you went to Caterina's place after all?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There are tons of resources here, and Miss Caterina even left her notes in a lot of these scripts.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She's really passionate about her job, huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Stop sighin', won'tcha?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Everybody knows yer actin' thingy ain't just another way of chasin' Texas. Leastwise, you don't want it to be.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Right. But, finding her is still our top priority...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: After all, Lappland is back in Siracusa, and she's been doing some pretty crazy stuff.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If you think about, it makes perfect sense.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It always feels like she's there, wherever Texas shows up.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Do you think she's doing it to help Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Lookin' at the scoreboard, Texas sure as sunshine got her name cleared. But ain't that kinda strange, whichever way ya look at it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yes. I'm sure she has her own goals.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Gaaah, I don't have what it takes to deal with that woman.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Anyways, she ain't no friend of Texas, don't take a genius to know that much. But her attitude ain't much like an enemy, neither.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: End of the day, I just can't figure out for the life of me what it is she wants outta Texas.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But, the mille-feuille she gave me earlier was really good.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't wanna hear nothin' outta that hungry mouth of yours.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It's kind of like how I used to look at Mostima. I couldn't figure her out, but after I gradually stopped thinking about her, she actually started to make sense to me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I feel like it's the same with Lappland.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: For people like her, there's no point trying to guess at what they're thinking. It's better to just accept what they say at face value.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Only if every word they say is true can you start to figure if they're ultimately trying to weave truths into a lie.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Time for me to get some chow. Exusiai, you watch over things, okay?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You got it~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sora, are you practicing your lines again?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Oh, hi there, Miss Caterina.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We're about to start our performance of Act II of 'La Morte di Texas,' so I have to step it up.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, I completely forgot. Time sure has a way of sneaking up on you.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Exusiai, would you like some pizza?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Sure would!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: By the way, Miss Caterina, since you're the playwright, you'll be coming to watch the show, right?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I actually wanted to tell you that I'm going away for a while.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: For how long?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Well... It shouldn't be too long, if everything goes as planned.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's nothing major. Something happened back home, and as the eldest daughter, I have to go back and get everything under control.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Being a big sister is hard work, isn't it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Haha. It's not so bad.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I'm still not sure what to do for the climax of Act III.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: *sigh*... Maybe I can find some inspiration back home this time.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Come on, don't look at me like that. We just won't be seeing each other for a bit. I should still be able to find the time to come watch Act II.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Who knows, maybe I'll surprise you backstage and invite you out.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: After all, I rarely get to make new friends, and I wouldn't want to miss the performance of a script I wrote myself.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Right. That settles it then. If you're coming by, you have to let me know!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I'm off then. Goodbye.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Bye bye~
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: See you later~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Donna, you didn't bring any luggage?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: After we're done here, I have to head back to finish my script. What's there for me to bring?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: How have the Saluzzos and Bellones been reacting?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The Saluzzos invited Leontuzzo to a banquet, and the old wolf Bernardo agreed to it.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: That banquet may end up very interesting, and everyone has eyes on it now.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Should we respond in any way?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Wallach, help me make some travel plans.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I'm going to go watch the opening performance of 'La Morte di Texas' Act II.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Is the script you wrote that important to you?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Of course. It is the product of my painstaking labor.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Also, didn't you just ask how we were going to respond?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: That is my response, seeing how Bernardo Bellone is about to step away from his own theater.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Naturally, I, Giovanna Rossati, ought to return.
attributes.name: Giovanna
